name: Portal Gun
description: Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device that allows players to create two connected portals on compatible surfaces.

name: Weighted Storage Cube
description: Standard cube used for solving puzzles by holding down buttons.

name: Companion Cube
description: A special weighted cube with a heart symbol. Functions like a normal cube but has emotional significance.

name: Energy Pellet
description: A bouncing energy sphere used to activate mechanisms by reaching a catcher.

name: Turret
description: Autonomous gun turret that targets the player. Can be knocked over or destroyed.

name: Radio
description: A small radio that plays music or voice signals. Can be picked up.

name: Cake (Unconfirmed)
description: A metaphorical or hidden object referenced throughout the game. Symbolic item.
